trans-unit.source: Represents a response from WCF Data Services that contains binary data as a stream.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma resposta do WCF Data Services que contém dados binários como um fluxo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see langword="Content-Disposition" /> header field for the response stream.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o campo de cabeçalho <see langword="Content-Disposition" /> para o fluxo de resposta.

trans-unit.source: The contents of the <see langword="Content-Disposition" /> header field.
trans-unit.target: O conteúdo de <see langword="Content-Disposition" /> campo de cabeçalho.

trans-unit.source: When the `Content-Disposition` header is not present in the response, the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse.ContentDisposition%2A> property returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `Content-Disposition` cabeçalho não está presente na resposta, o <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse.ContentDisposition%2A> propriedade retorna `null`.

trans-unit.source: Gets the content type of the response stream.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de conteúdo do fluxo de resposta.

trans-unit.source: The content type of the response stream.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de conteúdo do fluxo de resposta.

trans-unit.source: When the `Content-Type` header is not present in the response, the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse.ContentDisposition%2A> property returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `Content-Type` cabeçalho não está presente na resposta, o <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse.ContentDisposition%2A> propriedade retorna `null`.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Libera todos os recursos usados pela instância atual da classe <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse" />.

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse.Dispose%2A> method when you have finished using the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse>.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse.Dispose%2A> método quando você terminar de usar o <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse>.

trans-unit.source: This releases resources held by the object.
trans-unit.target: Isso libera recursos mantidos pelo objeto.

trans-unit.source: You should always do this to release the resources held by the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse>; otherwise, the consumed resources will not be released until after the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method on the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse> object.
trans-unit.target: Você sempre deve fazer isso para liberar os recursos mantidos pelo <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse>; caso contrário, os recursos consumidos não serão liberados até o coletor de lixo chama o <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> método no <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse> objeto.

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse.Dispose%2A> method is called and all references to the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse> are released, the memory used can be reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Após o <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse.Dispose%2A> método é chamado e todas as referências para o <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse> são lançadas, a memória usada pode ser recuperada pela coleta de lixo.

trans-unit.source: You cannot use <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse> after calling the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse.Dispose%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível usar <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse> depois de chamar o <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse.Dispose%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of headers from the response.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de cabeçalhos da resposta.

trans-unit.source: The headers collection from the response message as a <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2" /> object.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de cabeçalhos da mensagem de resposta como um <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2" /> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The response is a <xref:System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary%602> object that contains key-value pairs of strings for each header in the response.
trans-unit.target: A resposta é um <xref:System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary%602> objeto que contém pares chave-valor de cadeias de caracteres para cada cabeçalho de resposta.

trans-unit.source: Gets the binary property data from the data service as a binary stream.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os dados de propriedade binária do serviço de dados como um fluxo binário.

trans-unit.source: The stream that contains the binary property data.
trans-unit.target: O fluxo que contém os dados de propriedade binária.

trans-unit.source: When a network errors occurs while reading from this stream, an error is raised.
trans-unit.target: Quando ocorre um erro de rede durante a leitura do fluxo, um erro será gerado.

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.IO.Stream> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IO.Stream> retornado é somente leitura.

trans-unit.source: You must call either the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse.Dispose%2A> method on the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse> or the <xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A> method on the <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: Você deve chamar o <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse.Dispose%2A> método no <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse> ou <xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A> método no <xref:System.IO.Stream>.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the network connection remains open and unavailable to other applications.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, a conexão de rede permanece aberta e disponível para outros aplicativos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.HttpWebResponse.GetResponseStream%2A> method is used to access the stream.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Net.HttpWebResponse.GetResponseStream%2A> método é usado para acessar o fluxo.

trans-unit.source: When the <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse" /> is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: Quando a <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse" /> já foi descartada.
